title: I Took Up A Job As A Night Guard...
itunes:title: I Took Up A Job As A Night Guard...
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Everyone needs a job...

***

Written by RiknDiknDakn123 (and check out their book HERE) with guest narration by Nate Dufort and Peter Lewis

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
